CustomField.description: Score based on Total # of years as EDF Donor.
CustomField.formula: IF ( of_Years_as_EDF_Donor__c >=10,1, IF ( of_Years_as_EDF_Donor__c >=5,2, IF ( of_Years_as_EDF_Donor__c >=3,3,4)))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Score based on Total # of years as EDF Donor.
CustomField.label: Prospect Donor Year Score
